alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 3:30PM CDT until August 26 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynn, or 7 miles west of Lake Charles State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles State Park... Strawberry... Lynn... Alicia... Minturn... Smithville... Strangers Home... Eaton... Lauratown... Clover Bend... Calvin... Coffman... Driftwood... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
